directories.name: 97161084_sparsity_selector
directories.description: The value of the sparsity selector selects the sub-columns in the Tensor Memory to form the sparsity metadata matrix, which is used with matrix `A` to form the multiplicand matrix.

files.title: Overview
files.summary: This instruction `tcgen05.mma.sp` can be used when the matrix `A` is a structured sparse matrix with 50% zeros in each row distributed as per its sparse granularity.

files.title: 9.7.16.10.8.1. Sparse tcgen05.mma.sp with .kind::tf32
files.summary: For `.kind::tf32`, matrix `A` is structured sparse at a granularity of `1:2`. In other words, each chunk of two adjacent elements in a row of matrix `A` has one zero and one non-zero element.
